projects.name: GenAI Factory Maintenance Platform
projects.description: Developed a cutting-edge Generative AI-powered factory maintenance platform that integrates multimodal AI for predictive maintenance in manufacturing environments. The system combines image and text inputs to provide actionable insights for maintenance teams.
projects.challenge: Manufacturing facilities needed an intelligent system that could understand both visual defects and textual maintenance reports to predict equipment failures before they occur.
projects.solution: Built a multimodal RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architecture using LLaMA2/3 for language understanding, Llava1.6 for vision-language integration, and DINOv2 for advanced visual feature extraction. Implemented vector database using ChromaDB for efficient semantic search.
achievements: Showcased at Mobile World Congress 2025 in Barcelona
Real-time multimodal inference with sub-second response time
Seamless integration with enterprise systems (ServiceNow, SharePoint)

impact.technical: First-of-its-kind multimodal RAG system for industrial maintenance
impact.business: 30% reduction in unplanned downtime, 25% cost savings
impact.recognition: Featured at MWC 2025 as innovative AI solution

responsibilities: Fine-tuned LLaMA models for maintenance domain

projects.name: Real-Time Defect Detection System
projects.description: Developed a high-performance computer vision system for real-time defect detection in manufacturing lines. Achieved industry-leading 90ms inference time for instant quality control feedback.
projects.challenge: Manufacturing lines required real-time defect detection with <100ms latency to prevent defective products from progressing down the line.
projects.solution: Implemented optimized YOLO-based detection pipeline with custom CNNs, deployed on edge devices with cloud synchronization. Built automated MLOps pipeline for continuous model improvement.
achievements: Automated MLOps pipeline for model retraining

impact.technical: Industry-leading inference speed with enterprise-grade accuracy
impact.business: 40% reduction in defect-related costs, improved product quality

projects.myRole: Senior AI Consultant & Computer Vision Lead

projects.name: Meta-Learning System for Heterogeneous Data
projects.description: Developed novel meta-learning approach for heterogeneous transfer learning in image classification. Research focused on using Hebbian plasticity principles to enable cross-domain knowledge transfer.
projects.challenge: Traditional deep learning models struggle to transfer knowledge across different domains (e.g., from images to text). Needed a unified approach for heterogeneous data types.
projects.solution: Designed neural networks with neuromodulated dopamine plasticity that mimics biological learning. Created 200-dimensional vector embeddings that unify image and text representations using CIFAR-100 and GloVe datasets.
achievements: Novel approach to heterogeneous transfer learning
Clustering accuracy of 87% using class hierarchy
Funded by Ministry of Science and ICT, South Korea

impact.technical: Advanced state-of-art in transfer learning research

responsibilities: Conducted experiments on CIFAR-100 and GloVe
Collaborated with VisionOnChip for hardware optimization

projects.name: Optimized CNNs for Hardware Accelerators
projects.description: Developed highly optimized Convolutional Neural Networks specifically designed for hardware accelerators. Focused on model compression and efficient inference for resource-constrained devices.
projects.challenge: Standard CNN architectures are too computationally expensive for edge devices and hardware accelerators. Need optimized models without sacrificing accuracy.
projects.solution: Designed custom CNN architectures with pruning, quantization, and knowledge distillation. Optimized for specific hardware accelerator constraints while maintaining >95% original accuracy.
achievements: Reduced model size by 80% with <2% accuracy loss

impact.technical: Enabled real-time AI on resource-constrained devices
